title: Website Design
description: This course covers topics in web design, including UI/UX principles, responsive layouts, accessibility, and web optimization. You'll gain hands-on experience using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build websites.

title: Search Engine Optimization
description: This course delves into keyword research, on-page and off-page SEO, link building, and Google Analytics. You'll learn how to optimize content for search engines and develop a successful digital marketing strategy.

title: Copywriting
description: This course teaches you how to write compelling copy that captures attention and drives conversions. Learn storytelling techniques, brand messaging, and how to craft high-impact ads, emails, and website content.

title: Graphic Design Fundamentals
description: This course covers color theory, typography, composition, and branding. You'll gain hands-on experience using Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator to design stunning visuals for web and print media.

title: Python Programming
description: This course introduces the basics of Python, covering variables, data types, control flow, functions, and object-oriented programming. Perfect for beginners looking to enter software development or automation.

title: Photography for Beginners
description: This course covers camera settings, composition, lighting, and post-processing techniques to help you take professional-quality photos. Ideal for beginners looking to improve their photography skills.
